deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0500 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
F Full DisclosureFull Disclosure
P Partial DisclosurePartial Disclosure
N No DisclosureNo Disclosure

name: ConsentDisclosureLevel
title: consentDisclosureLevel
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying how much information was disclosed to the subject as part of the informed consent process.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the CON segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0500 (Consent Disclosure Level)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
